settings.text:
FuzeOBS
[Main Scene]

Select you monitor in the 'Displays' folder and choose
what screen you'd like to show.

In the 'Webcam' folder, select your webcam and
any overlays if applicable. You may have to resize any overlays.

If desired, connect Alert Box + Chatbox by going to StreamLabs
Dashboard and getting the widget URLs.

Delete this text source and any other unused source!
